data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sendra, Alberto, Yoshizawa, Kazunori, Ferreira, Rodrigo Lopes (2018): New oversize troglobitic species of Campodeidae in Japan (Diplura). Subterranean Biology 27: 53-73, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/subtbiol.27.28575, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/subtbiol.27.28575
